room_title: Escape room "Raiders of the Lost Room" by AdventurEscape in Hartford
room_address: 1 Corporate Dr, Suite 102 Windsor Locks, CT 06096
room_description: Based on the exciting true story of Pirate David Marteen, you and your fellow adventurers are tasked with finding the 200 million dollars’ worth of treasure he stole from the Spanish galleon Neptune in the 1650’s.  The recent discovery of a cabin in the area where the chest was supposedly buried has renewed interest in the quest for the treasure. Follow the clues left behind by former treasure hunters in hopes of discovering the lost fortune before someone else beats you to it.
